member.name: M:SPC.API.Controllers.AuthController.Login(SPC.Core.DTOs.Authentication.LoginDto)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token

member.name: M:SPC.API.Controllers.AuthController.RefreshToken(System.String)
member.summary: Refreshes an expired access token using a refresh token
member.returns: New authentication response with new tokens

member.name: M:SPC.API.Controllers.AuthController.RevokeToken(System.String)
member.summary: Revokes the refresh token for a user
